titles.title: Cleanse Thou My Heart, O God

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Cleanse Thou my heart, O God,
For Thou alone art able
To deliver me from all my despair.
Save me for Thy great name's sake.
Chorus:
Grace, grace, I cry to Thee.
Grace, shout grace to the Lord.
Save me for Thy mercies' sake.
Encompass me, O Holy One,
With Thy songs of deliverance.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Make haste to deliver me
According to Thy word, O God.
Purge away my sins, for Thy mercy is good.
Be pleased, O Lord, to deliver me.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Teach Thou my heart to fear,
For Thou alone art able
To draw me near to Thy throne of grace,
To deliver me for Thy great name's sake.
